title: B2B Lead
description: This mixin is used to capture information regarding a B2B Lead.

xdm:converted.title: Converted Indicator
xdm:converted.description: Indicates whether the Lead was successfully converted or not.

xdm:convertedAccountID.title: Converted Account ID
xdm:convertedAccountID.description: Account Id if the lead was successfully converted.

xdm:convertedContactID.title: Converted Contact ID
xdm:convertedContactID.description: Contact Id if the lead was successfully converted.

xdm:convertedDate.title: Converted Date
xdm:convertedDate.description: Date of conversion if the lead was successfully converted.

xdm:convertedOpportunityID.title: Converted Opportunity ID
xdm:convertedOpportunityID.description: Opportunity Id if the lead was successfully converted.

xdm:deleted.title: Deleted Indicator
xdm:deleted.description: Indicator whether the lead was deleted.

xdm:emailBouncedDate.title: Email Bounced Date
xdm:emailBouncedDate.description: If bounce management is activated and an email is sent to a contact, provides the date when the email was bounced.

xdm:emailBouncedReason.title: Email Bounced Reason
xdm:emailBouncedReason.description: If bounce management is activated and an email is sent to a contact, provides the reason for bounced email.

xdm:leadSource.title: Lead Source
xdm:leadSource.description: Field recording what source the lead originated from.

xdm:leadStatus.title: Lead Status
xdm:leadStatus.description: Field recording the current marketing/sales status of the lead.

xdm:annualRevenue.title: Annual Revenue
xdm:annualRevenue.description: Estimated Amount of annual revenue of the lead organization.

xdm:leadOrganization.title: Organization Attributes
xdm:leadOrganization.description: Organization attributes if the lead is an organization.
